name: Wrath
description: Wrath is a semi-automatic sniper title for Dahl, Hyperion, S&S Munitions, and Torgue rifles. These guns hit hard and usually roll high elemental tech (x2 to x4), though a few can appear without an elemental accessory.
notes: The Wrath title (Title_Tech1_Wrath) is granted to high-tech semi-auto sniper rifles. It generally indicates an elemental accessory, but rare non-elemental rolls can still qualify. The part boosts damage and further increases tech. See stat modifiers for details.
